Core.name: Barbarian
Core.desc: The barbarian is a brutal berserker from beyond the edge of civilized lands.

Core.name: Bard
Core.desc: The bard uses skill and spell alike to bolster his allies, confound his enemies, and build upon his fame.

Core.name: Cleric
Core.desc: A devout follower of a deity, the cleric can heal wounds, raise the dead, and call down the wrath of the gods.

Core.name: Druid
Core.desc: The druid is a worshiper of all things naturalâ€”a spellcaster, a friend to animals, and a skilled shapechanger.

Core.name: Fighter
Core.desc: Brave and stalwart, the fighter is a master of all manner of arms and armor.

Core.name: Monk
Core.desc: A student of martial arts, the monk trains his body to be his greatest weapon and defense.

Core.name: Paladin
Core.desc: The paladin is the knight in shining armor, a devoted follower of law and good.

Core.name: Ranger
Core.desc: A tracker and hunter, the ranger is a creature of the wild and of tracking down his favored foes.

Core.name: Rogue
Core.desc: The rogue is a thief and a scout, an opportunist capable of delivering brutal strikes against unwary foes.

Core.name: Sorcerer
Core.desc: The spellcasting sorcerer is born with an innate knack for magic and has strange, eldritch powers.

Core.name: Wizard
Core.desc: The wizard masters magic through constant study that gives him incredible magical power.

Advanced Players Guide.name: Alchemist
Advanced Players Guide.desc: The alchemist is the master of alchemy, using extracts to grant him great power, mutagens to enhance his form, and bombs to destroy his enemies.

Advanced Players Guide.name: Cavalier
Advanced Players Guide.desc: Mounted upon his mighty steed, the cavalier is a brave warrior, using his wit, charm, and strength at arms to rally his companions and achieve his goals.

Advanced Players Guide.name: Inquisitor
Advanced Players Guide.desc: Scourge of the unfaithful and hunter of horrors, the inquisitor roots out the enemies of her faith with grim conviction and an array of divine blessings.

Advanced Players Guide.name: Oracle
Advanced Players Guide.desc: Drawing upon divine mysteries, the oracle channels divine power through her body and soul, but at a terrible price.

Advanced Players Guide.name: Summoner
Advanced Players Guide.desc: Bonded to a mysterious creature called an eidolon, the summoner focuses his power on strengthing that connection and enhancing his strange, otherworldy companion.

Advanced Players Guide.name: Witch
Advanced Players Guide.desc: Lurking on the fringe of civilization, the witch makes a powerful connection with a patron that grants her strange and mysterious powers through a special familiar.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Arcanist
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Blending the power of the sorcerer with the versatility of the wizard, the arcanist draws upon a reservoir of power to bend magic to her will.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Bloodrager
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Fusing the frenzy of the barbarian with the bloodline might of the sorcerer, the bloodrager calls upon innate power to give himself extraordinary abilities.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Brawler
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Focusing on hand-to-hand combat, the brawler mixes the martial artistry of the monk with the specialist training of the fighter.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Hunter
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Though both the druid and ranger can have animal companions, the hunter takes this bond to the next level, forming a deadly duo with her savage ally.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Investigator
Advanced Class Guide.desc: With the rogue's cunning complemented by the alchemist's magical talent, the investigator is a peerless problem solver.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Shaman
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Calling on the divine power of the oracle and the hexes of a witch, the shaman communes with her spirit animal to unleash doom upon her foes.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Skald
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Sharing fury through song and deed, the skald takes the rage that lives in the heart of the barbarian and inspires it in others using the performances of the bard.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Slayer
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Mixing the precise strikes of the rogue with the special training of the ranger, the slayer hunts down his foes with ruthless efficiency.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Swashbuckler
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Combining the prowess of the fighter with the determination of the gunslinger, the swashbuckler is an acrobatic melee combatant.

Advanced Class Guide.name: Warpriest
Advanced Class Guide.desc: Blending the cleric's divine might and the fighter's martial skills, the warpriest brings the fight to the enemies of his faith.

Prestige.name: Battle Herald
Prestige.desc: A veteran whose masterful tactics and air of command inspire allies to greater feats of heroism.

Prestige.name: Holy Vindicator
Prestige.desc: A pious warrior who spreads religion at the edge of a sword.

Prestige.name: Horizon Walker
Prestige.desc: A scout and wanderer comfortable in even the strangest terrain.

Prestige.name: Master Chymist
Prestige.desc: An alchemist whose mutagens create an alternate, brutish personality.

Prestige.name: Master Spy
Prestige.desc: An espionage expert specializing in disguises and striking swiftly from the shadows.

Prestige.name: Nature Warden
Prestige.desc: A master of the wilderness bonded spiritually to a fearsome animal companion.

Prestige.name: Rage Prophet
Prestige.desc: A bold and barbaric champion who embraces otherworldly powers in order to perfect the art of combat.

Prestige.name: Stalwart Defender
Prestige.desc: A master of defending territory and holding the line at all costs.
